page.title: 17OUR LOCAL SHOPPING
page.content: OUR LOCAL SHOPPING EAST KILBRIDE The St. Leonards shopping area has a few shops in it. These shops include Safeway supermarket, Safeway wines and spirits, Fourbuoys newsagent/Post Office, Bank of Scotland, Gemini hair fashions, St. Leonards Pharmacy, Muirhead butchers and Emanuel's chip shop. There is also a library nearby and the Bonnie Prince Charlie pub. There are no clothes shops in the shopping area. People usually go to the town centre for clothes. Most people think the St. Leonards shops are good for every day things like food, drink, and (if needed ) medicines. There is usually a fish van that sits outside beside the car park. The shops are under cover which is good on wet or cold days. The shops are convenient for our community.
